name: The Cheesecaek Factory
title: American chain restaurant offering sizable portions from a vast menu including signature cheesecake
review: I genuinely like the Cheesecake Factory. It offers a very good price quality ratio and I never had a bad dish. Today I had the Jambalaya Pasta and it was really good, the pasta was a little bit overcooked but the taste of everything was still great. We also had the angel hair pasta with shrimp and the salmon with broccoli and mashed potatoes. Everyone liked their food and it was really big portions so make sure you come hungry. We were served 2 delicious kinds of bread with butter as a starter and our server was very friendly and attentive.

name: Din Tai Fung
title: Popular global chain known for elevated dim sum & Asian dishes served in bustling quarters.
review: Amazing experience! We ordered 5 items, which was the perfect amount of food for 2 people. Everything was delicious! The cocktails were incredible too. The service was phenomenal, and the environment is great. The reason I give it 4 stars is that their reservation system/process makes it exceedingly difficult to make a reservation. Weâ€™ve been trying to come here multiple times over several years, and we just got lucky this time. Good luck!
